sentences.en: Ali's recitation was so good that she gave three encores.
sentences.cn: 阿丽的朗诵是那么好,她给三次叫好.

sentences.en: His ability in recitation is better than in our class.
sentences.cn: 请把他们记下来,课后背诵.他背诵能力,我们班最好.
他的朗诵几乎毫无感情.

sentences.en: His recitation was cadenced and rich in feeling.
sentences.cn: 他的朗诵抑扬顿挫,富有感情.

sentences.en: His singing and recitation are and clear; his performance and witty.
sentences.cn: 唱念俱佳,文武兼备, 表演诙谐风趣,嬉戏怒骂皆能入戏.

sentences.en: In our class, each student's recitation comes in its turn.
sentences.cn: 在我们班上, 每个学生轮着背书.

sentences.en: Paper copies of visual presentation materials should be distributed before the recitation.
sentences.cn: 报告相关图像资料的影本应于课程开始之前分发.

sentences.en: Recitation is rather tiresome, but it is very important.
sentences.cn: (背书是相当累人的, 但对我们来说是十分重要的. )

sentences.en: Recitation of the daily needs of article, and we share.
sentences.cn: 背诵每日需要的文章, 大家一起分享.

sentences.en: She continued her recitation of the week's events.
sentences.cn: 她接着逐一讲述这一周发生的事。

sentences.en: She has a talent for drawing, recitation and singing.
sentences.cn: 她在绘画 、 朗诵、唱歌方面都很有天赋.

sentences.en: The boy made many blunders as he stumbled through his recitation.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩在讷讷的背书中出了很多差错.

sentences.en: The letter was short — a simple recitation of their problem.
sentences.cn: 信写得很短——只是简单地说了一下他们的问题。

sentences.en: The transmission began with a recitation from the Koran.
sentences.cn: 节目一开始是一段《古兰经》朗诵。

sentences.en: When he finished his recitation, there was a spatter of applause.
sentences.cn: 他朗诵完了以后, 有阵稀稀落落的掌声.
